data.actual_result: It covers more part in portrait mode than in landscape mode.
data.expected_result: It covers equal amounts of the channel name header in both, portrait and landscape mode.
data.short_description: The connection problems in app notification covers a larger part of the channel name header in portrait mode than in landscape mode.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get the connection problems in app notification. - Observe the part it covers of the channel name header. - Now, switch to landscape mode and observe the part it covers of the channel name header.
